com.lexicon.library.restcontrollers

Class MemberRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lexicon.library.restcontrollers.MemberRestController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/rest")
public class MemberRestController
extends java.lang.Object
    A REST controller providing functionality for managing Members as well as allowing members to loan and return books.
    Author:
    Linus Karlbom

        @GetMapping(value="/member/{id}")
public Member findMemberById(@PathVariable
                                                                java.lang.String id)
                                                         throws MemberNotFoundException
        Finds a specific member.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the sought member.
        Returns:
        The sought member.
        Throws:
        MemberNotFoundException

      • deleteMemberById

        @DeleteMapping(value="member/{id}")
public void deleteMemberById(@PathVariable
                                                                  java.lang.String id)
                                                           throws MemberNotFoundException
        Deletes a specific member.
        Parameters:

      • updateMember

        @PutMapping(value="/member/{id}")
public void updateMember(@RequestBody
                                                            Member member,
                                                            @PathVariable
                                                            java.lang.String id)
        Replaces a specific member
        Parameters:
        member - The member which will replace the old member.
        id - The ID of the member to be replaced.

      • loanBook

        @PostMapping(value="/member/{memberId}/loan")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Loan> loanBook(@PathVariable
                                                                                                             java.lang.String memberId,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="book")
                                                                                                             java.lang.Long bookId,
                                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="days")
                                                                                                             java.lang.Long daysUntilDue)
                                                                                                      throws MemberNotFoundException,
                                                                                                             BookNotFoundException
        Creates a loan for a specific member of a specific book.
        Parameters:
        memberId - The ID of the member to make the loan.
        bookId - The ID of the book which will be loaned.
        daysUntilDue - The number of days from the time of lending until the book is due to be returned.
        Returns:
        The created loan.
        Throws:
        MemberNotFoundException
        BookNotFoundException - if no book with bookId exists or if the book is already loaned.

      • returnBook

        @PostMapping(value="/member/{memberId}/returnbook/{bookId}")
public void returnBook(@PathVariable
                                                                                     java.lang.String memberId,
                                                                                     @PathVariable
                                                                                     java.lang.String bookId)
                                                                              throws MemberNotFoundException,
                                                                                     BookNotFoundException
        Has a specific member return a specific loaned book.
        Parameters:
        memberId - The ID of the member to return the book.
        bookId - The ID of the book to be returned
        Throws:
        MemberNotFoundException
        BookNotFoundException - if no book with bookId exists or if it is not currently loaned by the specified member.

      • returnAllMembers

        @GetMapping(value="/members")
public MemberCollectionRepresentation returnAllMembers()
        Returns:
        A list of all the members for the library.

      • findMembersByName

        @GetMapping(value="/members/name/{name}")
public MemberCollectionRepresentation findMembersByName(@PathVariable
                                                                                                   java.lang.String name)
        Finds all members with a specific name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the sought members
        Returns:
        A list of all matching members.

      • addNewMember

        @PostMapping(value="/members")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Member> addNewMember(@RequestBody
                                                                                                    Member member)
                                                                                             throws MemberAlreadyExistsException
        Adds a new member for the library.
        Parameters:
        member - The member to add.
        Returns:
        The added member.
        Throws:
        MemberAlreadyExistsException - If a member with that ID already exists.
